name: Y?ky? Kumikyoku: All Star Project
description: Y?ky? Kumikyoku (Eternal Suite) is the final title in the Y?ky? Gens?kyoku series, and is once again a traditional Japanese adventure game. The story takes place in an alternate continuity where the characters from the previous games are all students at the same school. The player chooses a character from the series history, and then must become friends with another character while also keeping on top of their studies.
